meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the basaltes under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The basaltes formed from cooled lava flows.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a picture of a mysterious land made entirely of basaltes.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt heavy and solid like a piece of basaltes.
meanings.sent5: The basaltes shimmered in the moonlight, revealing its dark beauty.

meanings.definition: A type of igneous rock formed from solidified lava.
meanings.sent1: The hiker marveled at the towering cliffs of basaltes.
meanings.sent2: The basaltes cooled slowly underground to form its unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the basaltes were magical stones granting wishes.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as unyielding as a block of basaltes.
meanings.sent5: The basaltes glowed red-hot as it emerged from the volcano.

meanings.definition: A type of rock commonly used in construction and as a decorative material.
meanings.sent1: The architect chose basaltes for the elegant facade of the building.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor carved intricate designs into the smooth surface of the basaltes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about a house built entirely of basaltes blocks.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong and enduring as the basaltes columns.
meanings.sent5: The basaltes statue stood proudly in the town square, attracting many admirers.
